title: A novel ultrasensitive chemiluminescence enzyme immunoassay by employment of a signal enhancement of horseradish peroxidase-luminol-hydrogen peroxide reaction for the quantitation of atezolizumab, a monoclonal antibody used for cancer immunotherapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8167-8177
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00202D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ibrahim A. Darwish, Mohammad A. H. Ali, Mohammed S. Alsalhi, Daohong Zhang
An ultrasensitive non-competitive chemiluminescence enzyme immunoassay (CLEIA) for the quantification of atezolizumab (ATZ), a monoclonal antibody used for treatment of different types of cancer. The assay employed a new chemiluminescence-enhancement reaction for detection.
